name: Poisoft Thud Card
description:
What is "Thud"?

If the sum of the hands matches other people's layout.

Basic Rule

You can discard the same suit as the table card or a number card.

"Action Cards"

  • Depending on discards, there are special effects.
  • A : Skip
  • 2 : Draw2
  • 5 : The number of discards for the next player is 5 or less.
  • 8 / joker : Almighty: You can discard any layout. You can specify the mark for the next discard tag.
  • 9 : Reverse the order

"Bonus Rate"

  • The score is calculated by multiplying the discard bid by the bonus rate.
  • Bonus rate will be up according to conditions.

"Online play"

  • Bonus rate starts from the number of players.

"Wireless Play"

  • Bonus rate starts from the number of players.

"Online Ranking"

  • You may be the best "Thud" player in the world!
